publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5029 Ms Rosemary Byrne: Recognition for Care Providersâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the special commendation for HRM Homecare Services of Prestwick at the Care Accolades awards ceremony and also its shortlisting for the Scottish Modern Apprenticeship Award; notes that this is in recognition of the excellent work done by care providers for the most vulnerable in our community and their efforts in providing their staff with career development, and recognises that organisations such as HRM Homecare ensure that people are able to live as comfortably, safely and independently as possible.
S2M-5029 Recognition for Care Providers (lodged on 27 October 2006) Christine Grahame*, Bruce Crawford*, Tommy Sheridan*, Donald Gorrie*, Robin Harper*
S2M-5029 Recognition for Care Providers (lodged on 27 October 2006) John Scott*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Murray Tosh*, Eleanor Scott*
S2M-5029 Recognition for Care Providers (lodged on 27 October 2006) John Swinburne*
S2M-5029 Recognition for Care Providers (lodged on 27 October 2006) Rosie Kane*
